Welcome to the Dice App website!

Dice app is a dice roller for android without any ads or other unwanted features, it also has a simple UI.

This app has been tested on an old Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 (7.1‚Äù T-Mobile variant) running an unofficial and unstable LineageOS 14 (Android 7.1) ROM to ensure that it works well on older hardware.
